alert.note: Alert for Adams; Franklin; Kearney; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 7:28AM CDT until August 03 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM CDT FOR FRANKLIN...WESTERN WEBSTER...SOUTHWESTERN ADAMS AND SOUTHERN KEARNEY COUNTIES... At 728 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Minden to Upland to near Franklin, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Riverton and Norman around 740 AM CDT. Campbell around 745 AM CDT. Inavale around 750 AM CDT. Holstein around 755 AM CDT. Bladen around 800 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
